result.reason: Feature request to add Google Drive as a connection file sync/storage backend, requiring OAuth2 and Drive API integration
result.approach: Add a Google Drive sync provider using Google Drive API with OAuth2 authentication, integrating into the existing connection save/load infrastructure alongside the current local and SQL Server backends
